Load 'https://www.example.com/'

Verify the 'Get Started' button is visible, positioned at x=50, y=200, width 180px, height 50px, background color #007bff, text 'Get Started' with font size 18px, color #ffffff, font weight 600, border radius 8px, 12px horizontal padding, 10px vertical padding, no border, and aria-label 'Initiate application setup'
Focus the 'Email' input field

Verify its placeholder text is 'your.email@example.com', border changes to 2px solid #007bff, background color #f0f8ff, width 300px, height 40px, 8px padding, font family 'Arial', font size 16px, left margin 20px, is enabled, current value is empty, and aria-label 'Enter your email address'
Hover over the 'Products' navigation link

Verify its text color changes from #333333 to #007bff within a 200ms transition, background color becomes #f8f9fa, 15px padding, bottom border 2px solid #007bff, font size 16px, font weight 500, top 0px, is visible, alignment center, width 100px, and label 'Products and Services'
Open the 'Gallery' page

Verify the main image source is 'product_hero.jpg', loaded within 500ms, rendered dimensions 800x600px, natural dimensions 1920x1080px, alt text 'Premium product showcase', has 1px solid #cccccc border, 5px border radius, 10px bottom margin, opacity 1, no visible watermark, and top position 100px
Play the video

Verify the video is not muted, is visible, enters fullscreen mode within 1s, width 100% of the viewport, height 100% of the viewport, no border, current playback time updates, source 'video_clip.mp4', z-index higher than all other elements, centered horizontally, and its control bar has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.6)
Trigger a success notification

Verify the message 'Item added to cart!' appears at top right (x=calc(100% - 320px), y=20px), width 300px, height 60px, background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font weight 500, 10px padding, border radius 4px, disappears after 3s with a fade animation, and aria-label 'Success notification'
Click the 'Settings' button to open the dropdown

Verify the dropdown menu becomes visible, positioned directly below the button, width 200px, background color #ffffff, 1px solid #cccccc border, border radius 4px, 5px top margin, has exactly 5 options displayed, and aria-label 'User settings menu'
Verify the 'Profile' option within the dropdown has font size 14px, color #333333, and 8px vertical padding
Add an item to the cart

Verify the cart icon's badge displays a count of 1, has background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 12px, font weight 700, positioned at x=calc(100% - 40px), y=10px, border radius 50%, min-width 20px, and opacity 1
Add another item to the cart
Verify the cart icon's badge updates to '2'
Click the date input field

Verify the date picker modal appears, centered horizontally and vertically, background color #ffffff, width 320px, height 380px, 1px solid #cccccc border, border radius 8px, box-shadow, current selected date is '2023-10-27', and header's text alignment is center
Verify the 'Today' button within the date picker modal has font size 14px, color #007bff, and 5px padding

Verify the product description section width is 700px, content is visible and wraps correctly, 15px padding, and background color #f9f9f9
Open the 'Confirm Deletion' modal

Verify the modal is visible, centered on the screen, background color #ffffff, width 400px, height 250px, border radius 10px, 2px solid #ff0000 border, dark overlay with opacity 0.5, and aria-label 'Confirm action'
Verify the 'Cancel' button has background color #6c757d and text color #ffffff
Verify the 'Delete' button has background color #dc3545
Initiate a file upload

Verify the progress bar appears, located 50px from the top, width 400px, height 10px, background track color #e9ecef, border radius 5px, animation is smooth taking 500ms for each 1% change, is visible, and aria-label 'Upload progress'
Verify the progress indicator has background color #007bff, width 75% at 75% completion, and text '75%'
Expand the sidebar navigation

Verify the active menu item 'Dashboard' has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, and font weight 600
Click the 'Enable Notifications' toggle switch

Verify its state changes from disabled to enabled, background color changes from #ccc to #28a745, associated input's value becomes 'true', width 40px, height 24px, border radius 12px (pill shape), and label 'Enable Notifications'
